meanings.definition: Nutritious substances that people or animals eat or drink to maintain life and growth.
meanings.sent1: The grocery store sells a variety of foodstuffs for us to choose from.
meanings.sent2: It is important to have a balanced diet that includes different foodstuffs.
meanings.sent3: The foodstuffs in the fridge decided to throw a party while we were away.
meanings.sent4: Her brain was filled with foodstuffs of knowledge after studying for the exam.
meanings.sent5: The foodstuffs on the plate looked colorful and appetizing.

meanings.definition: Edible substances that provide nourishment for the body.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother always prepares homemade foodstuffs for us when we visit.
meanings.sent2: The soup contained various foodstuffs like vegetables and meat.
meanings.sent3: The foodstuffs in the pantry whispered to each other about their upcoming adventure in the recipe book.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is the foodstuffs of the soul, bringing joy and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The foodstuffs in the picnic basket attracted hungry squirrels in the park.

meanings.definition: Items that can be consumed as food.
meanings.sent1: The market offers a wide selection of foodstuffs for customers to purchase.
meanings.sent2: Foodstuffs like bread and cheese are common in many households.
meanings.sent3: The foodstuffs in the vending machine were tired of waiting to be eaten.
meanings.sent4: Music and art are the foodstuffs of the soul, feeding creativity and imagination.
meanings.sent5: The foodstuffs on the buffet table tempted guests with their delicious aroma.
